name: CleanGrow
tag_list: ion-selective-electrodes, algae, water, nutrients, carbon-nanotubes, ion-measurement, clean-technology
overview:
CleanGrow has developed carbon nanotube based sensors to measure ions in liquids. Using our sensors, for the first time, multiple ions can be measured simultaneously. Compared to competing technologies our sensors can also handle much smaller sample sizes.

Our sensors have broad application across multiple industries - measuring changing ion levels in bioreactors, nutrient levels in fertigation water for closed environment and field based agriculture, nutrient measurement in algae bioreactors and environmental testing for the water industry.
